info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:50PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ravalli County through 330 PM MDT... At 250 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodside, or 8 miles north of Hamilton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Stevensville, Victor, Woodside, Pinesdale, Bell Crossing and Corvallis. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 47 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
